title: Who Can Beat the 2021 Chiefs?
description:
Kevin is joined by The Athletic’s Nate Taylor and PFF’s Eric Eager to discuss the Chiefs’s offseason and how they look to remain dominant in the AFC. He returns by speaking with The Athletic’s Sheil Kapadia and ESPN’s Marcel Louis-Jacques about how the other teams in the AFC plan to dethrone the Chiefs.

Host: Kevin Clark 
Guests: Nate Taylor, Eric Eager, Shiel Kapadia and Marcel Louis-Jacques
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
